Constructor Detail

Packet

public Packet(org.apache.mina.common.IoSession session,
              int pID,
              byte[] pData)
Creates a new packet with the specified parameters. The packet is considered not to be a bare packet.

Parameters:
session - The session to associate with the packet
pID - The ID of the packet
pData - The payload the packet

Packet

public Packet(org.apache.mina.common.IoSession session,
              int pID,
              byte[] pData,
              boolean bare)
Creates a new packet with the specified parameters.

Parameters:
session - The session to associate with the packet
pID - The ID of the packet
pData - The payload of the packet
bare - Whether this packet is bare, which means that it does not include the standard packet header
